title: Well Designed Tag LIne, Slogan, Catch Frase, etc?
content:
Does anyone know of any well designed Tag Lines for companies? I can’t think of any off the top of my head, but i just got 1000 type treatments in today so I will peruse that. I am wondering if anyone has ever done an article on this. But let me know if you have any examples you like!

 [‹ what TYPE fashion is in at the moment?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324012250/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29707 "Go to previous forum topic") [Alternative typeface for Sauna italic ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324012250/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29681 "Go to next forum topic")
author: j_polo9

comments.content:
[http://www.adslogans.co.uk/hof/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324012250/http:/www.adslogans.co.uk/hof/ "http://www.adslogans.co.uk/hof/")

Is that what you mean? Probably not because they are just named here and you can’t see how they were used, but perhaps you can look from there to see how they designed the many different taglines..

dav.

Thanks, Good idea! Also this is a good resource to look for slogans:

[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Category:Advertising\_slogans](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324012250/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Category:Advertising_slogans "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Category:Advertising\_slogans")

I’ll let you know if i find any that I like.
